instructions: Start by sautéing the onion until it becomes translucent.
Add sweet paprika to the sautéed onion.
Incorporate a small amount of chopped tomato and a very small hot pepper.
Season with a pinch of salt.
Sauté for a short while until the ingredients are well combined.
Add water and bring to a boil.
Once boiling, crack whole eggs into the broth.
Optionally, you can add pieces of potatoes for added texture.
notes: This dish is a traditional Tunisian-Djerban Jewish recipe, often enjoyed as a comforting meal. The combination of spices and the addition of eggs create a rich and flavorful broth.
